availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elijah Carroll (Livingston County, KY, steamboat pilot)

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, steamboat pilot. Christian County, Kentucky, native. Son of Malinda Carroll. Married to Amanda M. Hopick Carroll in Livingston County, Kentucky, on October 25, 1853. Father of J. W. Carroll. Steamboat pilot in Livingston County in 1850. Steamboat pilot in Livingston County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Smithland, p. 387B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Smithland, p. 283.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994045, Livingston County Marriages, p. 207.
